title: Ascend: Children of Lilith
description: Twins Arya and Xavier have never met their father, raised by a single mom in Peak's Village, Colorado, but on the eve of their 16th birthday, they learn a shocking reality: their mother is the Lilith from legend and their father is not what they expected. When they ascend to claim their birthright, they discover a world their mother hid from them and the profound and terrible history of the family they always dreamed of having. Filled with a rich, diverse tapestry of characters, this inclusive story is a new twist on Ancient Mythology. Modern elements combine old magic with folklore to unravel an adventure never told before. Stay updated on Twitter @lapetitewolfe
author: L.M. Gose
